actions.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management

official_title: To direct the Director of the Federal Emergency Management Agency to convey an easement to St. Louis County, Missouri, for the construction, operation, and maintenance of a road in Lemay, Missouri.

summary.text: Requires the Director of the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) to convey an easement to St. Louis County, Missouri, for use in the construction, operation, and maintenance of a road in Lemay, Missouri.

titles.title: To direct the Director of the Federal Emergency Management Agency to convey an easement to St. Louis County, Missouri, for the construction, operation, and maintenance of a road in Lemay, Missouri.
